page.title: 14A DAY IN MY LIFE - SATURDAY
page.content: I get up at 8.20 because I have to go for swimming{(Recreation)}lessons at Mold baths. After a drink of coffee, I get changed, then get my swimming gear together. We start to go at 9.10 because my lesson is at 9.30. We travel there in our car which is a Maxi. After my swimming lesson finishes at 10.00, my mother, sister and I go into Mold where, on a Saturday and Wednesday there is a street market, because Mold is a market town. We look around the stalls and shops and buy some fruit and vegetables and clothes. When we get home we have hot-dogs for dinner. If it is a hot day I go with some boys from the village to a place called the Mill, where the river Terrig runs through and we have fun pushing one another in and the boys try to catch fish.
